description: Retrieves a paginated list of client devices that are associated with a core device.

parameters.name: coreDeviceThingName
parameters.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: associatedClientDevices
nested_items.description: A list that describes the client devices that are associated with the core device.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT thing that represents the associated client device.

nested_items.name: associationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the client device was associated, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
